About & Contact

Founder of Six Pixels, a web design and development shop operating out of spain

I have a degree in Yacht Design from Southampton Solent University. I am first and foremost a freelance web developper, based in France and working for international companies and public entities.

Some of my clients include global companies like Bosch and Coca Cola, and spanish ones such as Fundaci√≥n Mapfre, Ayuntamiento de Alcobendas and Museo Thyssen.

I love working with PHP and Javascript to develop an engaging user experience. I also really enjoy learning new skills. For example, at the moment, I am simultaneously writing an iOs app, an Android app, a Java enterprise web application, moving my blog from Wordpress to Jekyll, developping desktop apps with appcelerator Titanium and working on a few PHP webapps.
